Reference

All functions

add_column()

Complete data frame with columns

auc_test()

Test based on area under the deuteration curve

calculate_hdx_power()

Calculate power of statistical tests for HDX experiments

create_experimental_file()

Create experimental file

deuteros()

Simplest linear models for deuteration curves containing time, state of the protein and the interaction term,.

fix_columns_names_types()

Standardize column names and types

get_deuteration_single_timepoint()

Calculates deuteration for given timepoint

get_iso_probs_deut()

Calculate isotopic probabilities (intensity) and mass-to-charge ratio (m/z).

get_noisy_deuteration_curves()

Create a list of lists of noisy deuteration curves from theoretical spectra

get_spectra_list()

Get a list of spectra

hdx_anova()

ANOVA based on gls

houde()

Houde's test for deuteration curves

lme_model()

Linear mixed effects model proposed by Jurgen Claesen

memhdx_model()

Linear mixed effects model used in MEMHDX tools

plot_single_spectrum()

Draw mass spectrum

powerHaDeX

powerHaDeX

powerHDX-package

A short title line describing what the package does

prepare_input_peptides()

Prepare input for create_experimental_file

simulate_theoretical_spectra()

Simulate theoretical spectra of a deuterated peptide over time
